subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner defeated No. 1 Novak Djokovic, and second-seeded Andy Murray, the reigning Wimbledon and United States Open champion, fell to No. 6 Tomas Berdych.
snippet: John Isner defeated No. 1 Novak Djokovic, and second-seeded Andy Murray, the reigning Wimbledon and United States Open champion, fell to No. 6 Tomas Berdych.
